about.name: Aite
about.title: Web Developer
about.bio:
I'm a graduate from New York University where I received a bachelor's degree in Interactive Media Arts, and I also earned an associate's degree in animation from BMCC.

During my journey as a web developer, I've always been driven by the goal of making the web more interactive and engaging through 3D modeling and animation, as well as machine learning models. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and stay up to date with the latest trends in the field.

In addition to my academic background, I've also been running a freelance company with some friends where we create art and websites for people. Our projects have been really cool and sometimes require advanced technology such as computer vision, virtual production, or live coding to bring them to life.

As a web developer, I have the expertise and technical know-how to bring any project to life, from simple websites to complex web applications. I pride myself on being a creative problem solver with strong communication skills that make me a valuable asset to any team. I'm passionate about creating engaging and interactive experiences that leave a lasting impression on users.

projects.title: Paredol
projects.description: The site for Paredol, my freelance web design and development practice. You can find a lot more of my work through this site.

projects.title: Nabla
projects.description: The site for Nabla, Paredol's old identity. The mobile version adds a layer of natural physical interaction in using the gyroscope for manual sifting through projects.

projects.title: Geese
projects.description: This website for Geese takes advantage of OpenAI's DALLE-2 API and Firebase Cloud Functions to hourly generate a new image from a text prompt.
